I'm searching for a T205 Ed Grant for my Cincinnati team set.

T205
  * 90% of gold border
  * No creases
  * No paper loss (small corner tears okay)
  * No trimming
  * Preferred Backs: Hassan 30 or Cycle


Please take a look at the Gold Borders I currently have [URL="http://bailencards.com"]here[/URL]. I need something that will fit with these cards.

PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], any scans and prices.

Hi Steven,

I have a Severeid that may fit with your others.  

Asking $95 for the PSA 5 (NQ) , $50 for for the PSA 5 MC.

--
Mike
Bump for T205 Grant I'm still searching for.

Bump for the Grant!! Paying good to check this one off the list.
